channel.title: CVE Feed for Itech -- News Portal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Itech -- News Portal

item.title: CVE-2017-20131|2024-08-05T21:45:25.966Z -- itech -- news%20portal
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Itech News Portal 6.28. It has been classified as critical. Affected is an unknown function of the file /news-portal-script/information.php. The manipulation of the argument inf leads to sql injection. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.
